description: Provides assistance with the completion of applications including: FAFSA, Para-transit, Cash Assistance, Medicaid, Food Stamps, Job Applications, Passport, CCPS (Application for free and reduced-price meals) and Social Security card/benefits/disability insurance. Also offers Bilingual interpretation of English, Spanish, and Creole and written translation with public notary.\n\n###COL###
name: INTERPRETING & APPLICATION SERVICES, LLC.
